projects.title: Cloud Operational Data Analytics
description: Conducting data analytics (with data visualization, machine learning) on cloud operational data to improve the reliability of cloud systems.

projects.title: Todoq
description: The simplest command-line todo list to help with better focus at work.

projects.title: Send2Cloud
description: A bookmarklet to send documents to Dropbox.

projects.title: GreenDroid
description: I designed and developed the second-version hardware compiler tool chain to produce C-cores (conservation cores) from arbitrary C or C++ functions with LLVM for the GreenDroid architecture.

projects.title: Stack Miner
description: Stack miner is a software analysis tool locating the root cause of software performance bugs with data mining algorithms.
I proposed a new association mining rule “maximal contrast pattern pair mining in single database”, and a parallel algorithm to mine the patterns efficiently.

projects.title: Usage Log Analysis
description: We introduced the contrast sequence mining to usage log analysis, and conducted the analysis of user behavior change over time and search engine dimension.
